meta.name: Daily Financial Markets Summaries with SerpAPI and OpenAI GPT

parameters.content:
# üíπ Daily Financial Markets Summary with SerpAPI

This workflow fetches **live financial data** from SerpApi and generates a **daily market recap** using OpenAI.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions  

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Set Up SerpApi Connection  
1. Create a free account at [SerpApi](https://serpapi.com/)  
2. Copy your **API Key** from the SerpApi dashboard  
3. In **n8n** ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí SerpApi**  
   - Paste your API Key ‚Üí **Save**  
4. In the workflow, select your SerpApi credential in the **Finance Search** node.  

---

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Set Up OpenAI Connection  
1. Go to [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)  
2. Navigate to [OpenAI Billing](https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing/overview)  
3. Add funds to your billing account  
4. Copy your API key into the **OpenAI credentials** in n8n  



## üì¨ Contact  
Need help customizing (e.g., pulling multiple tickers, exporting to Google Sheets, or sending Slack/Email updates)?  

üìß **robert@ynteractive.com**  
üîó **[Robert Breen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/robert-breen-29429625/)**

options.systemMessage: You are a helpful assistant. Write a daily summary of the financial markets performance for the day. start with a paragraph summary, with bullet points with details.

parameters.content:
### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Set Up OpenAI Connection
1. Go to [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)  
2. Navigate to [OpenAI Billing](https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing/overview)  
3. Add funds to your billing account  
4. Copy your API key into the **OpenAI credentials** in n8n

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Set Up SerpApi Connection  
1. Create a free account at [SerpApi](https://serpapi.com/)  
2. Copy your **API Key** from the dashboard  
3. In **n8n** ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí SerpApi**  
   - Paste your API Key ‚Üí **Save**  
4. In the workflow, select your SerpApi credential in the **Google News Search** node.  

---
